name: ##Hazy Flame BR
author: anthonydelucv
notes: Proud of this hazy variation, took me from plat to Kog this season. It takes a bit of strategic playing not to overly clog your back row, but the lockdown potential was insane. Burn decks were an auto win. The only matchup that was challenging was CA if I went first
main8: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Raven
